title: Recipe fusion: Miso-Caramel Pork Chops with Apples and Garlic Mashed Potatoes

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 1
preparationSteps.mainStep: Prepare the ingredients for the mashed potatoes, place in a large bowl, they will be used together
bullets: Cut 4 large potatoes into 1-inch chunks
Peel 8 garlic cloves
2 teaspoons of salt

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 2
preparationSteps.mainStep: Measure ¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil that will be used in the mashed potatoes

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 3
bullets: Pat the 4 pork chops very dry with paper towels.
Season pork chops all over with salt and 2 teaspoons black pepper.
Measure 2 Tablespoons of canola oil (or other neutral oil)

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 4
preparationSteps.mainStep: Prepare the miso brown sugar mixture, in a small bowl, combine
bullets: 4 Tablespoons light brown sugar
2 Tablespoons white miso
2 Tablespoons apple cider vinegar
4 Tablespoons of water
Stir with a fork until smooth

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 5
bullets: Core 2 apples, then slice into ¼-inch thick slices

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 1
cookingSteps.mainStep: Heat a large saucepan with water over high heat until boiling. (5 minutes)
bullets: Add the large bowl with the potatoes, 8 garlic cloves and 2 teaspoons salt to the boiling water
Reduce heat to simmer. Cook until potatoes are tender. (15 minutes)
While potatoes are cooking, start to cook the pork

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 2
cookingSteps.mainStep: Heat a large skillet over medium heat
bullets: If the skillet is not large enough for 4 pork chops, cook it in 2 batches or use 2 skillets
Add and heat 2 Tablespoons oil (2 minutes)
Add the seasoned pork chops. Cook, flipping every 2 minutes, until browned and internal temperature reaches 135°F in the thickest part (10-15 minutes)
Transfer pork chops to a plate to rest
Turn off the heat and pour off all but 2 Tablespoons of fat from the skillet, enough to have a thin layer of fat

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 3
cookingSteps.mainStep: When the 15 minutes potato timer is done
bullets: Drain potatoes and garlic, reserving 1 cup of cooking liquid
Mash potatoes and garlic in the same saucepan
Beat in ¼ cup olive oil until well incorporated
Thin potatoes to desired consistency with reserved cooking liquid, adding a little at a time
Check seasoning and add more salt if needed
Cover mashed potatoes to keep warm.

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 4
cookingSteps.mainStep: Turn the heat for the large skillet to medium heat
bullets: Add apple slices to the skillet in a single layer
Cook apples without touching until browned underneath (2-4 minutes).
Pour the miso brown sugar mixture into the skillet and cook, scraping up browned bits and stirring, until the sauce thickens enough to coat the back of a spoon (2 minutes).

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 5
bullets: Add the pork chops and their juices back to the skillet and turn to coat in the caramel.
Serve pork chops with a spoonful of the apples and caramel alongside the garlic mashed potatoes

ingredients.name: Granny Smith apples or other tart -crisp apples

Pantry: 2 teaspoons Salt, plus more to taste
as needed 1 cup reserved cooking liquid
2 Granny Smith apples or other tart -crisp apples
